00041 bool breakpoint_list_add(breakpoints_list *list, unsigned int line)
00042 {
00043     if (breakpoint_list_has(list, line)) return false;
00044 
00045     breakpoint *b = (breakpoint*) malloc(sizeof(breakpoint));
00046     b->num  = ++list->count;
00047     b->line = line;
00048     b->next = 0;
00049 
00050     if (list->head)
00051     {
00052         breakpoint *prev;
00053         for (prev = list->head; prev->next != 0; prev = prev->next);
00054         prev->next = b;
00055     }
00056     else
00057     {
00058         list->head = b;
00059     }
00060 
00061     ++list->size;
00062 
00063     return true;

00065 bool breakpoint_list_rm(breakpoints_list *list, unsigned int num)
00066 {
00067     for (breakpoint *b = list->head, *bprev = 0; b != 0; bprev = b, b = b->next)
00068         if (b->num == num)
00069         {
00070             if (bprev)
00071                 bprev->next = b->next;
00072             else
00073                 list->head = b->next;
00074             free(b);
00075             --list->size;
00076             return true;
00077         }
00078 
00079     return false;
